content.title: Project9 | Professional Automotive Detailing Foam Solutions - Leofa
content.description: Project9 offers professional automotive detailing foam solutions with precision and durability. Our polishing pads and foam materials deliver efficient and optimal results for car care professionals.

hero.heading: Precision Foam Solutions for Professional Detailing
hero.subheading: Designed for the automotive sector and professional detailing needs, Project9 products offer precision and durability for efficient and optimal polishing results. Trust the quality that professionals choose.

about.heading: The Professional Choice for Automotive Care
about.description: Project9 is a sub-brand of LEOFA designed specifically for the automotive sector and professional detailing needs. Our products offer precision and durability to achieve efficient and optimal polishing results that professionals trust.

experience.title: 10+ Years
experience.description: Experience in foam manufacturing for automotive industry.

products.title: 50+ Products
products.description: Variety of polishing pads and detailing foam solutions.

partners.title: 200+ Partners
partners.description: Trusted by professional detailers across Indonesia.

satisfaction.title: 98% Satisfaction

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Project9?
whyChoose.description: Industrial-grade foam materials engineered for precision polishing and long-lasting durability in professional automotive care.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Each product undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure consistent performance and superior results.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Our team provides professional guidance to help you achieve the best detailing results.
